# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: 2+2

Відповідь: ] == 1:
					for i in range(4):
						dx[r,c],dy[r,c] = move(i+1)
						c2 = c + dx[r,c]
						r2 = r +dy[r,c]
						if F[r2,c2] != 1:
							check = 1
							F[r,c] = 0
							F[r2,c2] = 1
							c = c2
							r = r2
							count += 1
							break

		if check == 0:
			F[r,c] = 0
			knar = pick(F)
			r = knar[0]
			c = knar[1]
			count -= 2
			
		if count > L:
			L = count
			for i in range(N):
				for j in range(N):
					H[i,j] = F[i,j]
		
	maxx = 0
	for i in range(N):
		for j in range(N):
			if H[i,j] == 1:
				if maxx < (i+j):
